title: Climbed out of hell
body:
Silver 5 now. I believe I had an argument with somebody here a while ago that I wouldn't climb with my current win rate.

Well, Silver 5 now. Time to see if I can't keep climbing.

replies.body: Congrats, I just got out again myself after a very long absence. I feel that the game has gotten a lot easier (perhaps it's just the champs I play now).
towers are made of butter, so easy to push

Played a lot of Elise in top lane. A bit of a dark horse pick, but she's got strong base damage and % health damage which makes her a bit of a tank eater.

I felt the same too. I'd play Twisted Fate and just go hunting for gold cards in team fights and with good positioning I just cleaned up, got our team ahead and wiped out towers in 2-3 hits
Well.Silver is pretty tough,there are many toxic players.One reason why I took a break from ranked is because of the none-stop flame I get after a death.

Good luck m8 remember not to flame and make everyone hate you

then you win
all u really need to do is look at the map and ward. Its not hard
